channel.title: About the support category
channel.description:
Welcome to [cregox public forums][1]!
Any request for support should go here. Such as e-mails sent to [help@cregox.com][2].
This is traditionally a support page for my work as computer specialist, such as the **discontinued** one [offered on "your-home"][3].
[1]: http://talk.cregox.com [2]: mailto:help@cregox.com [3]: http://cregox.com/your-home [4]: http://specialists.squarespace.com/cregox [5]: http://cregox.com/projects [6]: http://talk.cregox.com/t/using-these-forums-for-customer-support/7410?u=cawas
